posts.body: Testing, testing. Death to all enemies of truth.
There really needs to be a way to mute threads while in catalog view.

>>4b32269c-0d59-4c96-bcd4-8213f838f55e
Good stuff, anon.
Without getting to "far out" I'd also add that religion and ideology are a kind of operating system for the human brain. As an operating system, the Jewish religion and the Jewish cultural identity are fundamentally incompatible with bedrock Western culture and render those who are running the operating system highly antagonistic to many founding principles of traditional Western civilization.
Western culture exalts strength and honor, while Jewish culture exalts the weak and treats honor as at best something that applies only during interactions with other Jews. Western culture believes at some level in universal morality while Jewish culture again treats morality as something that is pliable depending on who one is dealing with.
As long as they continue to cling to such a system of incompatible values, they will forever be parasitic outsiders who take more than they contribute. Deconstructing their own value system to live in harmony with the West would require the Jews to give up their central conceit of being "the Chosen" at which point they would effectively cease to be Jews.
That is why this is a struggle to the death: the only form of reconciliation is for either for Western men or the Jews to completely give up their identity. Jewish intellectuals of the Rabbinical tradition understand this well which is why they are perpetually worried about their extermination and constantly try and deprive the Western man of his identity.
They know that this is a battle to the death that has been more than 2,000 years in the making. The game is winner-take-all and the stakes are unbelievably high.

Good job, OP. While some anons here have legitimate concerns regarding a potential influx of newfags, some level of outreach to attract more high quality lurkers is a good thing and will help spread our memes and messaging faster.
If nothing else, the fact that our enemies don't want new people coming to our virtual beer halls and coming into contact with our ideas should tell you that expanding our reach in terms of users is a good idea, provided that we don't get flooded in the process.

>>b181aeca-7d00-4ac6-aa1b-192f9ae0f557
Econ anon here. It's already started. By Christmas it should be obvious to most anons. By Easter, it will be obvious even to the boomers. Buckle up buckaroos.

posts.subject: Blockchain Imageboard
posts.body:
https://haich.us/index.html
>Improved censorship resistance, anonymity and capacity compared to ZeroNet
>Pay a fraction of a cent in decentralized money per post to eliminate spam
>Adding to the network effect of bitcoin hurts (((you-know-who)))
Why aren't you immortalizing the last bastion of Western thought on the eternal blockchain, anon?

>>91264122-0861-4dc2-9736-b82eeea50e85
>uses a central server
How do you figure?

>>2078b2f3-b748-46c0-ab3b-8be7110188f5
That's just a simple frontend. The nuts and bolts are accessible to anyone through the blockchain and anyone can put up a similar frontend.
>>86421a1a-0f76-44c6-a104-ef42f13eb2ec
I posted that image specifically to trigger faggots like you. CSW could be Satoshi or he could not be. Anyone how expresses certainty either way is a dumb tribalistic nigger. And yes, I'm talking about a few sats per post.
>>d4613c87-4741-428e-9b29-7f8f1a5535fb
Staying anonymous requires obtaining the underlying currency anonymously. There are lots of ways to get BSV without leaving a trail. If you already have some crypto, you can easily get BSV anonymously through a chink exchange or one of the Shapeshift clones that doesn't kyc, etc.

>>9d140845-4879-4bf4-b227-ecf6d9321e90
Fair criticism, but there are ways of mitigating some of the issues you mention. One thing that comes to mind is giving a fraction of each post fee to the OP as an incentive for creating threads with sustained activity.
If the content can be made better through some well-tweaked system of monetary incentives, users will pay for the privilege of participation as well as the possibility of being rewarded themselves.
As for the glowniggers/shills having funds to continue their subversion: that will be less of an issue the larger things scale. Even an organization with deep pockets would have to stretch their funds to compete with 10s of thousands of legit posters, and if we ever got to 100s of thousands or millions of users, subversion by a single entity will become very, very costly.  
>Nevermind the fact that Bitcoin is a pain in the ass to get ahold of in some areas without doxing yourself to some kike middleman company
This is IMO the weakest argument you make here. There are more ways than ever of getting crypto without leaving a trail. It used to be Local Bitcoins was the only game in town. They now have obnoxious kyc rules in place but that has just resulted in more anonymous alternatives springing up all over the place.

>>cb3a89c5-f0dd-44c3-b4f0-abbe6f8d228f
That's why you introduce a rule that only keys signed on the blockchain with a balance equal to 20 USD or greater are acceptable. 
We're coming full circle since the days of SA...

>>1a34ed86-0148-4b07-8f00-9807011910be
What kind of toaster are you running ZN on, anon? I'm seeding from my main rig with ZN running in the background all day and haven't noticed any issues.
>>e5998371-14d6-4c06-8c99-593302ab5662
Looks okay as of now.
